1/28/26 - Wednesday Trash Service
=================================

**Trash/Refuse Notice:**

**Waste Connections has released an updated stating there will be no trash pickup on Wednesday January 28th.**

**We will release any updated information as it becomes available.**

![](//img1.wsimg.com/isteam/ip/49312170-715c-46ac-adf7-429542be2f6e/waste_connections__inc__logo.jpg/:/cr=t:0%25,l:0%25,w:100%25,h:100%25/rs=w:400,cg:true)

#### 1/27/26 - City Hall Closed

City Hall Closure Notice:

City Hall will be closed Tuesday January 27th, 2026, due to expected weather conditions.

The Town of Edgecliff Village follows Fort Worth Independent School District for related weather closures. Since FWISD will be closed, City Hall offices will be closed as well. 

We will reopen Wednesday January 28th, 2026 during regular business hours.

For Updates, continue to monitor our website.

Thank you for understanding and staying safe.

![](//img1.wsimg.com/isteam/ip/49312170-715c-46ac-adf7-429542be2f6e/download%20(1).jpg/:/cr=t:0%25,l:0%25,w:100%25,h:100%25/rs=w:400,cg:true)

#### 1/23/26 - Freeze Warning

**The National Weather Service has released a WINTER STORM WARNING**

 WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON CST SUNDAY

\* WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation expected. Ice accumulations  
between one quarter of an inch and one half of an inch. Isolated  
amounts up to three quarters of an inch can't be ruled out, mainly  
in eastern North Texas. In addition, sleet and snow accumulations  
between 1 and 3 inches are expected, with amounts near or above 5  
inches near the Red River.

\* WHERE...North Texas. (Including Edgecliff Village)

\* WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to noon CST Sunday.

**Tips During Winter Storms:**

* Keep Fresh Bottled Water.
* Keep Ready to Eat Meals.
* Have Spare Batteries and Flashlights.
* Charge Any Electronics Fully The Day Before.
* Have Spare Blankets Accessible.
* Have Spare Dry Firewood.
* Keep Pets inside or in Warm Locations.
* Cover Any Outside Faucets.
* Open Cabinets With Plumbing to allow Warm Air to circulate.
* Ensure Irrigation Systems are OFF.

**To Access Overnight Shelter:**

Individuals should first go to one of the regular emergency shelters:

* **Union Gospel Mission**, 1321 E. Lancaster Ave.
* **Presbyterian Night Shelter**, 2400 Cypress St.

Families should go to:

* **The Salvation Army Mabee Center**, 1855 E. Lancaster Ave.

If individuals arrive at regular emergency shelters and beds are full, they will be relocated to available overflow beds at one of the available additional emergency shelter locations.

![](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAD/ACwAAAAAAQABAAACADs=)

Additional Shelters and Warming Centers

[Download PDF](//img1.wsimg.com/blobby/go/49312170-715c-46ac-adf7-429542be2f6e/Warming%20Centers.pdf)

#### 1/21/26 - Hazardous Waste & Extra Bulk

**Household Hazardous Waste & Extra Bulk Notice:**

**Household Hazardous Waste:**

Service will be provided by HHW Solutions starting March 1st.

Residents will be able to schedule one pickup per month through their website:

[www.hhwsolutions.com](http://www.hhwsolutions.com) or by calling: (214) 226-5693

Until March 1st, residents can call Waste Connections Customer Service at (817) 222-2221

to schedule a HHW pickup.

**Extra Bulk Over 2cu yard Limit:**

Residents can call Waste Connections Customer Service at (817) 222-2221. After providing pictures, our Customer Service Team will work with Supervisors to provide a quote and schedule the pickup after payment is received. 

If you have any questions contact City Hall at: (817) 293 - 4313

![](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAD/ACwAAAAAAQABAAACADs=)

#### 1/9/26 - Trash/Refuse Update

**Regular Refuse/Trash Pick Up for the Town of Edgecliff Village is processed by Waste Connections. New Service Days Start on January 19th 2026.**

Regular Trash Pick Up Days:

\*Zone Map <https://evgov.org/refuse>

Zone 1 & 2: Monday & Thursday

Zone 3 & 4: Tuesday & Friday

Please have trash placed at curb by 7AM on pickup day to ensure service is provided. 

BULK TRASH NOTICE:

\*Zone Map <https://evgov.org/refuse>

Bulk Trash is limited to 2 cubic yards and set out on the 2nd day of your service week. 

Zone 1 & 2: Monday & Thursday - Bulk on Thursday

Zone 3 & 4: Tuesday & Friday - Bulk on Friday

RECYCLING NOTICE:

RECYCLING BINS BEHIND CITY HALL ARE AVAILABLE 24/7.

Thank you for your patience during this transition and information will be released as it becomes available.

If you have any questions contact City Hall at: (817) 293 - 4313

![](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAD/ACwAAAAAAQABAAACADs=)

#### 11/25/25 - Notice on Recycling Service

**RECYCLING NOTICE**

The current recycling bins behind City Hall will be picked up beginning November 25, 2025.  
New Waste Connections recycling bins will be delivered and placed behind City Hall on December 1, 2025.

Accepted materials remain: plastic, cardboard, and paper.

Please do not drop off recyclables between Nov. 25 and Dec. 1 during the bin transition.

Questions? Call 817-293-4313.

![](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAD/ACwAAAAAAQABAAACADs=)

#### 4/23/25 - EyeOnWater

Edgecliff Village Public Works has resumed meter upgrades. With the upgraded meters there is more transparency into each residents usage down to hour by hour usage rather than usage being measured monthly. Every resident will have the same access to view usage as Utility Billing. EyeOnWater allows our residents to view their usages and set up automatic alerts regarding their usage, as well as being able to pin point exactly when a leak or high usage occurs. 

Please refer to this link to get set up on EyeOnWater: 

<https://helpeyeonwater.com/>

For More Information Reach Out To Utility Billing At:

817-293-4313 or at

[ub@evgov.org](mailto:ub@evgov.org)

![](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAD/ACwAAAAAAQABAAACADs=)

#### 11/13/24 - Online Agenda Issues

City Hall is aware of an issue with being able to view the online agenda. It is currently being worked on to fix this issue. 

There is a Temporary fix:

- Select the agenda you would like to view.

- Once the link is shown, right click the link and select "open link in new tab"

The agenda will show correctly.
